resources.string: permission
SETTINGS
Not now
CONTINUE
CANCEL
TURN ON
To easily connect with friends and family, and send and receive photos and videos, allow BOTIM access to your contacts and your device\'s phones, media, and files.

To easily connect with friends and family, and send and receive photos and videos, allow BOTIM access to your contacts and your device\'s phones, media, and files.Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Contacts and Storage on.
To use your current location, allow BOTIM access to your location.
Please allow BOTIM to receive calls so that we call automatically confirm your phone number.
To scan the QR code and log in to BOTIM Web, allow %s access to your camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To log in to BOTIM Web, allow %s access to your camera so you can scan the QR code.
To answer this call from %s, allow BOTIM access to your microphone.
To answer this call from %s, allow BOTIM access to your microphone. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Microphone on.
"Allow BOTIM access to your device's photos, media, and files and try again."
"To view media, allow BOTIM access to your device's photos, media and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Storage on."
"To view media, allow BOTIM access to your device's photos, media and files."
To capture photos and videos, allow BOTIM access to your camera.
To capture photos and videos, allow BOTIM access to your camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.

To send a contact, allow BOTIM access to your contacts.
To help you connect with friends and family, allow BOTIM access to your contacts.
To help you message friends and family on BOTIM, allow BOTIM access to your contacts. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Contacts on.

"To record a Voice Message, allow BOTIM access to your device's photos, media, and files."
To call, allow BOTIM access to your microphone.
To call, allow BOTIM access to your microphone. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Microphone on.
To send a photo, allow BOTIM access to your camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To send a photo, allow BOTIM access to your camera.
To send a video, allow BOTIM access to your camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To send a video, allow BOTIM access to your camera.
To answer this video call from %s, allow BOTIM access to your camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To answer this video call from %s, allow BOTIM access to your camera. Tap Settings, unlock your phone, tap Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To answer this video call from %s, tap Continue, unlock your phone, and allow BOTIM access to your camera.
To answer this video call from %s, allow BOTIM access to your camera.
To place a video call to %s, allow BOTIM access to your camera. Tap Settings, unlock your phone, tap Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To place a video call to %s, allow BOTIM access to your camera.
To scan a security code, allow BOTIM access to your camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To scan a security code, allow BOTIM access to your camera.
To video call, allow BOTIM access to your camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To video call, allow BOTIM access to your camera.
To send a status update, allow BOTIM access to your camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To send a status update, allow BOTIM access to your camera.
To choose a Google account for backups, allow BOTIM access your contacts. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Contacts on.
To choose a Google account for backups, allow BOTIM access your contacts.
To find your backup on Google Drive, allow BOTIM access to your contacts. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Contacts on.
To find your backup on Google Drive, allow BOTIM access to your contacts.

To create a broadcast with your friends and family, allow BOTIM access to your contacts.
To make a call, allow BOTIM access to your contacts. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Contacts on.
To make a call, allow BOTIM access to your contacts.
To create a group with your friends and family, allow BOTIM access to your contacts. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Contacts on.
To create a group with your friends and family, allow BOTIM access to your contacts.
To notify your friends and family that you have changed your number, allow BOTIM access to your contacts. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Contacts on.
To notify your friends and family that you have changed your number, allow BOTIM access to your contacts.
To send a nearby place or your location, allow BOTIM access to your location. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Location on.
To send a nearby place or your location, allow BOTIM access to your location.
To send locations tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Location on.
To update your live location, allow BOTIM access to your location. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Location on.
To update your live location, allow BOTIM access to your location.
To record a Voice Message, allow BOTIM access to your microphone. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Microphone on.
To record a Voice Message, allow BOTIM access to your microphone.

To answer this call from %s, tap Continue, unlock your phone, and allow BOTIM access to your microphone.
Want to record videos with sound? Allow BOTIM access to your microphone. Tap Settings > Permissions and turn Microphone on.
Want to record videos with sound? Allow BOTIM access to your microphone.
To answer this video call from %s, allow BOTIM access to your microphone and camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Microphone and Camera on.
To answer this video call from %s, allow BOTIM access to your microphone and camera. Tap Settings, unlock your phone, tap Permissions, and turn Microphone and Camera on.

To answer this video call from %s, allow BOTIM access to your microphone and camera.
To video call, allow BOTIM access to your microphone and camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Microphone and Camera on.
To video call, allow BOTIM access to your microphone and your camera.
To verify your phone number, allow BOTIM to send SMS messages. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn SMS on.
To verify your phone number, allow BOTIM to send SMS messages.
To verify your phone number, allow BOTIM to send SMS messages and make and manage phone calls. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn SMS and phone on.
To verify your phone number, allow BOTIM to send SMS messages and make and manage phone calls.
To easily verify your number, BOTIM can automatically detect your verification code if you allow BOTIM to view SMS messages.
